*** Settings ***
Library           pandas
Library           Collections

*** Variables ***
${csvfile}        C:\\Python27\\Lib\\site-packages\\CodeLibWrapper\\RobotFrameworkSample\\SampleData\\pandas_csv.csv

*** Test Cases ***
Pandas_ShowVersion
    ${pandas_version}    Show Versions
    log    ${pandas_version}

Pandas_DataSource_ReadCSV
    @{csv}    Read Csv    ${csvfile}    encoding='gbk'
    ${newvalue}    Set Variable    ${csv}[u'商品编号']
    Comment    log many    ${newvalue}
    Comment    log    ${newvalue[0]}
    log    ${csv[1][1]}
